word: G3685 - ὀνίνημι - onínēmi - on-in'-ay-mee - Have joy

sections.paragraph: to be useful, to profit, help

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A prolonged form of an apparent primary verb ὄνομαι onomai; for which another prolonged form ὀνάω onaō is used as an alternate in some tenses (unless indeed it be identical with the base of G3686 through the idea of notoriety); to gratify, that is, (middle voice) to derive pleasure or advantage from: - have joy.
